description: G¨¦rald Darmanin tweets his support after police asked women relaxing on a beach to cover up.
title: Topless sunbathing defended by French interior minister
title_page: Topless sunbathing defended by French interior minister - BBC News
maintext: Police spokeswoman Lt Col Maddy Scheurer blamed the "clumsiness" of the two officers for the incident. "You will always see me in uniform," she wrote, "but the practice of topless tanning is allowed at the beach of Sainte-Marie-la-Mer."
